Class TestConvolutionBase

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Author:

      • testBinomialMask

        public static void testBinomialMask(ConvolutionNormalizationPolicy normalizationPolicy,
                                    int bitDepth,
                                    int multiplyFactor,
                                    int divideFactor)
        Validates image blurring by binomial convolutions with skipping steps.
        Parameters:
        normalizationPolicy - The integer only mask's normalization policy
        bitDepth - The bit depth for output embedding
        multiplyFactor - Factor by which the output values are multiplied
        divideFactor - Factor by which the output values are divided
        See Also:
        BlurFactory.getBinomialBlur(int, int, int, int, int, int), ConvolutionNormalizationPolicy, ConvolutionFactoryBase.embedOutput(boolean, int)

      • testMaskCompositionRepeated

        public static void testMaskCompositionRepeated(ConvolutionNormalizationPolicy normalizationPolicy,
                                               int nPointsUnit,
                                               int bitDepth)
        Validates image blurring by binomial convolutions with skipping steps, and composition of masks with lazy computation.
        Parameters:
        normalizationPolicy - The integer only mask's normalization policy
        nPointsUnit - Skipping steps in the binomial mask's application
        bitDepth - The bit depth for output embedding
        See Also:
